text:
Joaquín Carbonell Martí (12 August 1947 – 12 September 2020) was an Argentine singer-songwriter and poet. He was born in Alloza, Spain. His career began in 1976. He wrote columns about traditional Argentine music on "El Periódico de Aragón". He was known for performing with Jose Antonio Labordeta. His last concert was in 2014.
Carbonell died on 12 September 2020 in Zaragoza, Spain from COVID-19, aged 73.
